headline: Walgreens is officially private: Here's what happens now
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance is now a private company after Sycamore Partners officially closed its deal to acquire the pharmacy giant. Yahoo Finance Senior Health Reporter Anjalee Khemlani reports the details. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Sale of Walgreens to private equity company is finalized, Chicago area headquarters will remain
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance has officially become a private company, with private equity firm Sycamore Partners announcing Thursday morning that it’s completed its acquisition of the Deerfield-based retail pharmacy giant. The acquisition follows an announcement in March that Sycamore would buy the company for about $10 billion. Sycamore is a New York-based private-equity firm specializing in ...

headline: Sycamore Partners finishes deal to take drugstore chain Walgreens private
summary: The acquisition of Walgreens by a private equity firm is complete, ending the drugstore chain’s run as a publicly traded company.  Walgreens said Thursday that former Staples leader Mike Motz will become its new chief executive officer, replacing Tim Wentworth.  Walgreens had announced in March that it agreed to be acquired by Sycamore Partners in a deal valued at around $10 billion.

raw.headline: Sycamore Partners finishes deal to take drugstore chain Walgreens private
raw.summary: The acquisition of Walgreens by a private equity firm is complete, ending the drugstore chain’s run as a publicly traded company.  Walgreens said Thursday that former Staples leader Mike Motz will become its new chief executive officer, replacing Tim Wentworth.  Walgreens had announced in March that it agreed to be acquired by Sycamore Partners in a deal valued at around $10 billion.

headline: Walgreens names retail veteran Mike Motz as CEO after Sycamore takes chain private
summary: The management shake-up came on the heels of Sycamore's roughly $10 billion acquisition of Walgreens Boots Alliance, completed earlier in the day.  Motz, previously the CEO of office supplies chain Staples' U.S. retail business, will succeed Tim Wentworth and steer the ailing pharmacy operator as it shifts its focus back on core retail and pharmacy operations.

raw.headline: Walgreens names retail veteran Mike Motz as CEO after Sycamore takes chain private

headline: Boots splits off from Walgreens after private equity takeover

headline: Walgreen Co. To Operate as Private Standalone Company Following Acquisition By Sycamore Partners
summary: DEERFIELD, Ill., August 28, 2025--Walgreen Co. ("Walgreens", or the "Company"), America’s leading independent retail pharmacy, announced today that it is now operating as a private standalone company following its acquisition by Sycamore Partners ("Sycamore"), a leading private equity firm based in New York.

headline: CareCentrix to Operate As A Private Standalone Company Following Acquisition By Sycamore Partners
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., August 28, 2025--CareCentrix, a leading home-centered care company that coordinates care for health plans, patients, and providers, announced today that it is now operating as a private standalone company following its acquisition by Sycamore Partners ("Sycamore"), a leading private equity firm based in New York.

headline: Sycamore Partners Completes Acquisition of Walgreens Boots Alliance
summary: NEW YORK, August 28, 2025--Sycamore Partners ("Sycamore") announced today that it has completed its acquisition of Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (the "Company" or "WBA").

headline: How Broad S&P Index Removals at Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: On August 28, 2025, Walgreens Boots Alliance was removed from multiple major S&P indices, including the S&P 500, S&P 500 Consumer Staples, S&P Global 1200, and S&P 500 Value. This broad index exclusion is significant because it can trigger adjustments by passive funds and shape investor sentiment about the company's industry standing. Next, we'll consider how Walgreens Boots Alliance's removal from key S&P indices influences its investment narrative and positioning outlook. AI is about to...

headline: Sycamore Partners closes Walgreens acquisition, splits retailer into 5 companies
summary: The deal’s closure also comes with a raft of leadership changes. Mike Motz, the former CEO of Staples U.S. Retail, has been appointed as Walgreens CEO effective immediately.

headline: One of Wall Street's Hottest Stock-Split Stocks, Up Nearly 300% in 3 Years, Is Joining the S&P 500 Today
summary: Walgreens Boots Alliance is being shown the door in favor of a high-flying company that completed its first-ever stock split in mid-June.
